entry.title: $2400 // Featuring central heat and air, stainless steel appliances^^*^
entry.content:
1 Bed / 1 Bath on Hart St in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Central Av, Kosciuszko St, DeKalb Av. This extra large 1 bed, 1 bath with a balcony unit boasts space and style. Featuring central heat and air, stainless steel appliances, large windows and ample closet space. The building includes laundry, bike storage, elevator and a roof deck. Blink gym membership included! Just down the street from the Central M train, as well as a short walk to the J and L trains. Close to great local spots like Le Garage, Archie's Bar & Pizza, The Wheelhouse, Precious Metal and much more.

Contact Me directly at 34 seven 5 six 9 five 503 to schedule an appointment
